dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1300 IH: To amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer programs and community partnerships for the benefit of national wildlife refuges, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Runyan (for himself and Mr. Sablan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Fish and Wildlife Act of 1956 to reauthorize the volunteer programs and community partnerships for the benefit of national wildlife refuges, and for other purposes.

section.header: Reauthorization of National Wildlife Refuge System volunteer, community partnership, and education programs
